channel.title: Custom item problem, adding models (with pics)
channel.description:
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ymoxd5z2gzz]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ymoxd5z2gzz[/url]
that is my d claw model i made, it simple. I just have problems adding it to my client.
[IMG]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/8421/wielddclawls6.png[/img]
[img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/4743/dclawsqi3.png[/img]
I added the model to my models folder in my client folder.
This is my code in class8:
[code] if(i == 12222) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12222; //if you dont have a droped number put the weild number here class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 3780;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 3780;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Claws";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "a set of powerful claws".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]
When i type add model 12222 it says that there is no model (unable to find model. 12222) if i do add model [12222] it says syntax - ::add model <path>
Can someone please help me?

item.title: Custom item problem, adding models (with pics)
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Hey may i have the code for D Claws? I searched for them long. And where do i gonna add the code?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2009, 10:38:15 am[/size][hr]Can i have?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2009, 10:39:40 am[/size][hr]Does the D-Claws has 4 specs?

Read full topic
item.source: Custom item problem, adding models (with pics)

item.title: Custom item problem, adding models (with pics)
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ymoxd5z2gzz

that is my d claw model i made, it simple. I just have problems adding it to my client.

I added the model to my models folder in my client folder.

This is my code in class8:

if(i == 12222) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12222; //if you dont have a droped number put the weild number here class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 3780;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 3780;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Claws";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "a set of powerful claws".getBytes();//examin info }

When i type add model 12222 it says that there is no model (unable to find model. 12222) if i do add model [12222] it says syntax - ::add model

Can someone please help me?

Read full topic
item.source: Custom item problem, adding models (with pics)
